name: Client
description: Static Class present on Client side.

static_functions.name: CallLevelBlueprintEvent
static_functions.description: Calls a Level Blueprint custom event (which can be added when creating levels through Unreal Engine)

static_functions.name: DrawDebugLine
static_functions.description: Draws a Debug Line in the World

static_functions.name: DrawDebugPoint
static_functions.description: Draws a Debug Point in the World

static_functions.name: DrawDebugSphere
static_functions.description: Draws a Debug Line in the World

static_functions.name: ProjectWorldToScreen
static_functions.description: Transforms a 3D world-space vector into 2D screen coordinates

static_functions.name: DeprojectScreenToWorld
static_functions.description: Transforms a 2D screen coordinates into 3D world-space location

static_functions.name: InitializeDiscord
static_functions.description: Initializes the Discord Integration with your custom client_id

static_functions.name: SendChatMessage
static_functions.description: Sends a chat message which will display local only

static_functions.name: SetChatConfiguration
static_functions.description: Configure the Chat

static_functions.name: SetChatVisibility
static_functions.description: Set if the Chat is visible or not

static_functions.name: SetCrosshairEnabled
static_functions.description: Enables/Disables the Blood Screen effect

static_functions.name: SetBloodScreenEnabled
static_functions.description: Enables/Disables the Blood Screen effect

static_functions.name: SetBloodScreenIntensity
static_functions.description: Manually sets the Blood Screen intensity
static_functions.description_long: If you want the Blood Screen to do not be overridden, disable it with Client.SetBloodScreenEnabled(false) before

static_functions.name: SetHardwareCursor
static_functions.description: Loads or sets a hardware cursor from the content directory in the game

static_functions.name: SetDiscordActivity
static_functions.description: Communicates with Discord and sets a custom user status

parameters.name: reset_time
parameters.description: Whether or not to reset current activity elapsed time

static_functions.name: SetDebugEnabled
static_functions.description: Enables/Disables Debug settings to be used

static_functions.name: SetInputEnabled
static_functions.description: Toggles Local Player input

static_functions.name: SetMouseEnabled
static_functions.description: Displays/Hides Mouse Cursor

static_functions.name: SetMousePosition
static_functions.description: Sets the mouse position

static_functions.name: SetHighlightColor
static_functions.description: Changes the Highlight Color for highlighted actors at a specific Index
static_functions.description_long:
Changes the Highlight Color for highlighted actors at a specific Index. Multiply it by 5 (or more) for having a glowing effect.

HighlightMode.Always will always be visible, even behind walls
HighlightMode.OnlyHidden will only be visible if behind a wall
HighlightMode.OnlyVisible will only be visible if not behind a wall

Note: You can only have 3 differents indexes (0, 1 or 2).

static_functions.name: SetOutlineColor
static_functions.description: Changes the Outline Color for outlined actors at a specific Index
static_functions.description_long:
Changes the Outline Color for outlined actors at a specific Index. Multiply it by 5 (or more) for having a glowing effect.

Note: You can only have 3 differents indexes (0, 1 or 2), and the default Outline color index used by the game is 0 (when interacting with stuff).

static_functions.name: SetSteamRichPresence
static_functions.description: Sets Steam Rich Presence value

static_functions.name: SetValue
static_functions.description: Sets a global value in the Client, which can be accessed from anywhere (client side)
static_functions.description_long:
Sets a global value in the Client, which can be accessed from anywhere (client side)

Please refer to Entity Values for more information

static_functions.name: Subscribe
static_functions.description: Subscribes for an Event

static_functions.name: Unsubscribe
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed Events in this Class and in this Package, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

static_functions.name: TraceLineSingle
static_functions.description: Trace a ray against the world and returns a table with the first blocking hit information
static_functions.description_long:
Trace a ray against the world and returns a table with the first blocking hit information

Note: The Trace will collide with the ObjectType (in the Collision Settings), even if the channel is ignored below.

parameters.name: collision_channel
parameters.description: Supports several channels separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

parameters.name: trace_mode
parameters.description:
Trace Mode, pass all parameters separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

You need to explicitily pass the modes to return the values you want

parameters.name: ignored_actors
parameters.description: Array of actors to ignore during the trace

static_functions.name: TraceLineMulti
static_functions.description: Trace a ray against the world using object types and return overlapping hits and then first blocking hit
static_functions.description_long:
Trace a ray against the world using object types and return overlapping hits and then first blocking hit

Note: The Trace will collide with the ObjectType (in the Collision Settings), even if the channel is ignored below.

Results are sorted, so a blocking hit (if found) will be the last element of the array

Only the single closest blocking result will be generated, no tests will be done after that

parameters.name: collision_channel
parameters.description: Supports several channels separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

parameters.name: trace_mode
parameters.description:
Trace Mode, pass all parameters separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

You need to explicitily pass the modes to return the values you want

parameters.name: ignored_actors
parameters.description: Array of actors to ignore during the trace

static_functions.name: GetLocalPlayer
static_functions.description: Gets the local Player

static_functions.name: GetFrameTime
static_functions.description: Gets the current Frame Time

static_functions.name: GetRandomReachablePointInRadius
static_functions.description: Finds random, reachable point in navigable space restricted to radius around origin
static_functions.description_long: Finds random, reachable point in navigable space restricted to radius around origin (only if map has a NavMesh)

static_functions.name: GetRandomPointInNavigableRadius
static_functions.description: Finds random, point in navigable space restricted to Radius around Origin. Resulting location is not tested for reachability from the Origin
static_functions.description_long: Finds random, point in navigable space restricted to Radius around Origin. Resulting location is not tested for reachability from the Origin (only if map has a NavMesh)

static_functions.name: FindPathToLocation
static_functions.description: Finds a Path given Start and End location
static_functions.description_long: Finds a Path given Start and End location (only if map has a NavMesh)

static_functions.name: GetTime
static_functions.description: Gets the Unix Epoch Time in milliseconds

static_functions.name: GetMap
static_functions.description: Returns the current Map

static_functions.name: GetMousePosition
static_functions.description: Gets the current mouse screen location

static_functions.name: GetPackages
static_functions.description: Returns a list of Packages folder names loaded and running in the client

static_functions.name: GetViewportSize
static_functions.description: Gets the size of viewport

static_functions.name: GetValue
static_functions.description: Gets a value given a key

static_functions.name: InputKey
static_functions.description: Forces an Input Key event on Local Player
static_functions.description_long:
Forces an Input Key event on Local Player

This won't trigger any Scripting event as it bypass internal validations

static_functions.name: IsKeyDown
static_functions.description: Returns if a key is being pressed

events.name: Chat
events.description: Called when a chat text is submitted (by LocalPlayer)

return.description: Return false to do not send the message

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The message send by the player

arguments.name: player
arguments.description: The player who send the message

events.name: ChatEntry
events.description: Called when a Chat Entry is received, this is also triggered when SendChatMessage is called
events.description_long:
Called when a Chat Entry is received, this is also triggered when SendChatMessage is called

This is also triggered when SendChatMessage is called (useful for creating your own Chat interface while still use the built-in system)

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The message send by the player

arguments.name: player
arguments.description: The player who send the message

events.name: Console
events.description: Called when a console command is submitted

events.name: KeyDown
events.description: A keyboard key is being pressed

arguments.name: key_name
arguments.description: The message send by the player

events.name: KeyPress
events.description: A keyboard key has been pressed

events.name: KeyUp
events.description: A keyboard key has been released

events.name: LogEntry
events.description: Called when a Client log is received

events.name: MouseDown
events.description: A mouse button has been pressed / is being pressed

events.name: MouseUp
events.description: A mouse button has been released

events.name: MouseEnabled
events.description: When mouse cursor is displayed/hidden

events.name: MouseMoveX
events.description: Called when the mouse moves in the X axis

events.name: MouseMoveY
events.description: Called when the mouse moves in the Y axis

events.name: MouseScroll
events.description: Called when the mouse scrolls

events.name: OpenChat
events.description: When player opens the Chat

events.name: CloseChat
events.description: When player closes the Chat

events.name: OpenConsole
events.description: When player closes the Console

events.name: CloseConsole
events.description: When player closes the Console

events.name: Tick
events.description: Called Every Frame. Do not abuse

events.name: SpawnLocalPlayer
events.description: Called when the local player spawns (just after the game has loaded)

events.name: ViewportResized
events.description: Called when the screen is resized

events.name: WindowFocusChanged
events.description: Called when the game is focused/unfocused
